summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 14, 15 and 16, Block 6; Lots 14 to 19, inclusive, in Blocks 7, 8, 9 and 10; Lots 1, 2, 3, 28, 29 and 30, in Blocks 11, 12, 13 and 14; and Lots 1, 2 and 3, Block 15, H. E. Nelson Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-63 and 17-40, respectively.
